Text: Thanks but could you please add info about the rip? any subs?

It's from the orginal UK dvd released 2001, I have shrinked it with dvdshrink but other than that it is untouched with extras.

There are no subs on the original dvd, as far as I know there are no subs on any dvd release of this movie.

It appears there is a german release from 2005 with german and english subs but I don't have that.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3311784/Paris__Texas_Special_edition_by_Wim_Wenders_of_2005
hey, anybody knows where can i find early films from wenders ? like "falsche bewegung", "Alice in den St채dten" or "Kings of the Road"...
I cant play it with VLC or windvd! Do I do something wrong?
Please help! I really love to see this movie!

aka66joe:

I'm going to download this now, and as you see this is a .ISO file (Paris, Texas.ISO).
to play this, you will have to mount it, or burn it on a DVD. ISO is a image file, a virtual DVD on your computer. 

How to play:
1. download daemon tools (www.daemon-tools.cc) - install it - right click the symbol - emulation - all options ON.
2. right click daemon tools icon in the down left corner, choose virtual CD/DVD ROM >  Mount image > Choose the paris, texas ISO file > now your movie is mounted, and can be played in VLC or any other DVD playing program. 

hope this helps, -Virtuality
Quality is good. Don't be fooled by the opening scene, it actually is that bad on the original.
